title: 'War from within,' end of beards, stricter physical tests: Trump and Hegseth unveil new direction for US military
subhead: Before nearly 800 generals and admirals, the US president and his defense secretary laid out their vision for a military purged of its 'woke' elements. Its primary mission would now be to combat enemies from within, starting with Democrat-led cities.

title: Morocco's unprecedented youth mobilization puts the government to the test
subhead: Social justice protests have been held across the country since Saturday, September 27. The government met in an emergency session on Tuesday, and promised to respond 'positively' to the demonstrators' demands.

title: The EU is underestimating the destruction of its natural areas
subhead: As environmental policy faces setbacks across Europe, the 'Green to Grey' investigation reveals that European land take is far higher than the official figures reported by EU authorities.

title: In Greece, an abbot is arrested for trafficking religious artifacts
subhead: Affiliated with the monastery of Kalavryta, in the Peloponnese, the clergyman was caught as he attempted to sell 14 Byzantine icons and two 18th-century Gospels for the sum of €200,000.

title: 'Cracker Barrel's collapse might just be a matter of marketing missteps, but it speaks volumes about the conservative moment the US is experiencing'
subhead: After changing its logo and decor, the American restaurant chain faced a fierce campaign orchestrated by Donald Trump's supporters. Even corporate strategy is not immune to the conservative revolution, writes Le Monde's New York correspondent Nicolas Chapuis.
